scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install & cd ..
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start_server
scripts.start_newdata: npm run build_newdata && npm run start_server
scripts.build: npm run build_server && npm run build_client
scripts.build_newdata: npm run build_server && npm run build_data && npm run build_client
scripts.test_all: npm run lint --prefix ./server && npm run lint --prefix ./client && npm run build_newdata && npm run coverage_old --prefix ./server
